channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Application Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Application Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-8076|2024-08-04T21:10:32.977Z -- adobe -- application%20manager
item.description: Adobe application manager installer version 10.0 have an Insecure Library Loading (DLL hijacking) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to Arbitrary Code Execution in the context of the current user.
